## TestScore Departement of Education

```{r}
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
```
### Importing dataset
```{r}
ts <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AlainKuiete/DATA607/master/3-8_ELA_AND_MATH_NYC_SUMMARY_2019.csv")
head(ts)
```
### Selecting some variables
```{r}
ts1 <- ts %>% select(code = BEDS.CODE, Name = NAME, Subject = SUBJECT, TOTAL.TESTED:MEAN.SCALE.SCORE)
str(ts1)

```

```{r}
ts1 <- ts1 %>% separate(LEVEL.1.PCT,  c("LEVEL.1.PCT", NA)) %>%
                separate(LEVEL.2.PCT,  c("LEVEL.2.PCT", NA)) %>%
                separate(LEVEL.3.PCT,  c("LEVEL.3.PCT", NA)) %>%
                separate(LEVEL.4.PCT,  c("LEVEL.4.PCT", NA)) %>%
                separate(LEVEL.2.4.PCT,  c("LEVEL.2.4.PCT", NA)) %>%
                separate(LEVEL.3.4.PCT,  c("LEVEL.3.4.PCT", NA))
 
ts1 
```



### Converting character to numeric


#### Separate %
```{r}
ts1
```



##### this removes the column if all your character columns need converted to numeric

```{r}
ts1 %>%
  select(TOTAL.TESTED:MEAN.SCALE.SCORE) %>%
  replace("-",NA) %>% 
  mutate_if(is.character,as.numeric) %>%
  str()
```



```{r}
tbl_df(ts1)
ts1
```

#### Summarizing

```{r}
ts1 %>% group_by(Subject) %>% summarise(count = n(),
        total1 = mean(MEAN.SCALE.SCORE
, na.rm = TRUE))
```
